title: Redwood National and State Parks: Distance Learning
body: Distance Learning      Educators, if getting to Redwood is challenging we have a great solution - we'll bring the redwoods to you!  We have created a series of lessons, materials and videos so you can lead your own curriculum experience. You can access that  with our  distance learning videos and lesson plans. These will eventually cover K-5 grade. For more information email us or call the education team at 707.465.7396 for assistance.        Results   Showing results 1-3 of 3    Sort By:  Title Date         Redwood National and State Parks Structure and Function - Animal Teeth(First Grade: Lesson 2 of 3)       Type:Distance Learning Grade level:Lower Elementary: Pre-Kindergarten through Second Grade Subjects:Science        Redwood National and State Parks Structure and Function - Banana Slugs(First Grade: Lesson 1 of 3)   This video introduces the students to Redwood National and State Parks, structure and function, and provides an example of different structures and their functions of the banana slug.    Type:Distance Learning Grade level:Lower Elementary: Pre-Kindergarten through Second Grade Subjects:Science        Redwood National and State Parks Structure and Function - Redwood Trees(1st Grade: Lesson 3 of 3)       Type:Distance Learning Grade level:Lower Elementary: Pre-Kindergarten through Second Grade Subjects:Science
